snippet.title: Ad Infinitum - Exclusive Release Date Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description:
Ad Infinitum is a first-person shooter horror game developed by Hekate. Set during World War 1, players will embody a soldier where his past, present, reality, and nightmares all blend together. Navigate through a grim and dark landscape filled with terrors as players try not to lose their minds in the process. Ad Infinitum launches on September 14 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
